metadata.title: CVE-2022-25638 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In wolfSSL before 5.2.0, certificate validation may be bypassed during attempted authentication by a TLS 1.3 client to a TLS 1.3 server. This occurs when the sig_algo field differs between the certificate_verify message and the certificate message.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
